Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbonauts,

In an earlier discussion about optimizing the range of single-stage vehicles, it was mentioned that some parts, e.g. STAT panels, ladder rungs, etc. don't actually add any mass or drag to a ship. I looked for info about this on the Wiki, but all it said was that this was implemented in 0.23 without listing the parts. I looked back in the forum for the 0.23 announcement, but I saw no mention of this in the new feature list and no link to a more detailed change log. Could some kind soul please let me know where to find the list of parts that have had this property? Thanks!

Edited October 28, 2014 by herbal space program

I think that anything below 0.05t is massless. I'm not sure if the same list is also physics-less, but things like cubic octagonals and ladders certainly are. The stock plane landing gear used to have no physics/mass, but I read somewhere that this might recently have changed.
The wiki has a list of massless parts.

The wiki has a list of massless parts.

Thanks! Not sure why I didn't think to click on that link on the Wiki page.
